abstract: The Federal Trade Commission and Department of Justice are exploring opening an antitrust probe into Apple.
snippet: The Federal Trade Commission and Department of Justice are exploring opening an antitrust probe into Apple.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission and the Department of Justice are exploring whether to open an antitrust inquiry into Apple over its recent actions restricting developers writing apps for its iPhone operating system.

headline.main: Government Weighing Possible Apple Antitrust Probe
